column5: I always try to convince myself that NEXT time I WILL take smaller amounts at a time and conserve it but as SOON as I get that ball I’m taking the most ENORMOUS bumps known to man. After two bumps I am completely geeked but we all know once you start it’s hard to stop, at least for me. After today I will be taking a LONGGGG break. I’m on my 6th gram right now but I got a Klonopin for the comedown. Hope I don’t die😂
It’s wild how we KNOW what’s coming yet we voluntarily shove the shit into our nostrils. Cocaine? I hate you bitch. But I fucking LOVE you.  And we all know love is stronger than hate😂
It’s wild how we KNOW what’s coming yet we voluntarily shove the shit into our nostrils. Cocaine? I hate you bitch. But I fucking LOVE you.  And we all know love is stronger than hate😂
👏🏽 Damn my guy. Bet that comedown was hellish, huh?😂

😬Yeah, I’ve only been tricked into trying glass mixed with white ONCE. I did ONE bump and I was high for 13 hours and it WASNT enjoyable. How you got through and 8 ball is beyond me but I definitely commend you bro😬

Also, I am completely, skiid out of my mind right now. It feels good and shitty at the same time but if I stop it’s just going to be shitty. I don’t want that. I’ve done TOO much for the benzo I have to REALLY take affect I would need two at this point. Maybe I’ll try to find one later but for now I’m just going to ski until I’m dead broke

Impressive. Are you a frequent user or more like
me who goes on binges once, twice and sometimes three times a year? I don’t like cocaine very much but once I’ve started I WONT stop until I am COMPLETELY out of money. Worst part is that is just delaying the comedown and going to make it MUCH worse. Now, I don’t recommend taking a benzo to help the comedown but I typically do. Js
By yourself or with someone else?

Skateboarding saved my life man. Before skating, joy was non existent. I was so dead set on ending my life, you couldn't tell me nothing. Im a single father and even HE couldn't save me which seems incredibly selfish but regardless it was true. at one point I KNEW I was going to take my own life. I have been skating for 2 years now and I don't think ill ever turn back. Still have my days but once I hop on that board it all just disappears.
So it's guaranteed to have completely evaporated off
That's the answer I was looking for. Dark side of the moon, here I come
Should be? Or will be? I need concrete answers
I don't mean to be a bother, just genuinely concerned.
Doesn't LSD come into contact with alcohol at some point or another? It's a reasonable question
